text: Mokhzani Mahathir (born 2 January 1961) is a businessman from Malaysia. He used to work in Kedah UMNO but stopped being involved in politics now. Mokhzani is the second oldest son of the ex-Prime Minister of Malaysia, Mahathir Mohamad. Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Malaysian businesspeople Category:Mahathir Mohamad family
title: Mokhzani Mahathir
